name: GDPR Toolbox
author: Berto LÃ³pez

sections.description:
This plugin features a toolbox with various utilities for better GDPR compliance.

In this first version, this plugin adds a mandatory checkbox to comment form where the user agrees to his personal data being collected by the comment form.

This plugin adds also an option to the discussion settings that allows the checkbox label to be customized, so that it can include,
for example, a link to the site’s privacy policy page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Customize the text for the GDPR checkbox label in the discussion settings page.

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

short_description: This plugin allows you to customize the default text of the GDPR checkbox label in the comment form.
